en.purpose: To determine whether chronic watery diarrhea is from osmotic or secretory causes.
en.use:
Use with persistent (>4 weeks) watery diarrhea (>3 episodes/day) to guide diagnosis and treatment.

Formula: Stool Osmolal Gap = Stool Osm - (2 * (Na + K))
en.misuse: Not indicated in evaluation of acute diarrhea.
